ygData.subject: The Shadow Destiny

From: "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@...>

The transwarp passage opened near the nexus known as Earth. A large form 
then made its way through and flew towards the planet. It ressembled some 
kind of winged whale, but it was obviously not an organic being. However, 
the very way it moved told of organic origins...

Inside the ship, three transformers operated the Shadow Destiny. They were 
the Prophets, the elite Tripredacus Strike Force.

Gesper:
We are on final approach of Earth. Geostationnary orbit in 3,2, 1... stable 
orbit achieved.

The ship's wings flailed in the void of space to keep it over a precise 
continent of the planet.

Melchana:
Target in sight. I can fire whenever you wish.

Belthassan:
Prepare the key to vector Sigma. Fire when you have a lock.

Melchana:
What? We have the key with us? This is utter madness! You jeopardize this 
mission by bringing it with us!

Belthassan:
Shut up, sister! The key shall be terminated as soon as we have no more use 
for it, and that time will be right after you have fired it! Now stop 
discussing and do your job!

Melchana reluctantly agreed with her elder brother, but she would never say 
it to anyone else. She knew it was necessary to the operation...
She fired and she looked through the monitors. The whole continent was being 
technologicized...

Belthassan:
Now, Melchana, fire the reformatting cannon...

She fired the gun once again. This time, the continent started to reflorish 
and it became techno-organic. Australia had become a fusion of organisms and 
technology.

Belthassan:
Prepare for atmospherical entry. Gesper, land the Shadow Destiny at the 
Southeast point of Australia and prepare it for deployment. Melchana, track 
the Hellgate and send a message to lieutenant Daemos concerning our arrival. 
Finally, jettisson the key to vector sigma and fire the reformatting cannon 
on it.

The key, hit by the ray, started glowing brightly and exploded. Its light 
could be seen from many places on the earth.
